annotations.description: Although the Big Lebowski helped to re-popularize the White Russian around 1998, the Cohen Brothers nor Jeff Lebowski himself were responsible for the creati...
annotations.title: Dude, We're Reconstructing The White Russian

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Vodka
1oz (30ml) Coffee Liqueur
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup (really to taste)

Mix in glass with ice. 
Top with Hand Whipped Heavy Cream
(Include creme de Cacao with cream if desired)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jTh9UXPWdPU
title: White Russian
